# atomicByZone

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether CloudKit modifies records atomically by record zone.

## Declaration

```swift
var atomicByZone: Bool
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], CloudKit processes record changes atomically by record zone, and if any individual change fails, all other changes in that record’s record zone fail and return an error of type [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKError/Code/batchRequestFailed].

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
